item.title: CVE-2024-31412|2024-07-25T14:36:05.441Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in CX-Programmer included in CX-One CXONE-AL[][]D-V4 Ver. 9.81 or lower. Opening a specially crafted project file may lead to information disclosure and/or the product being crashed.
